title: Preseason Rolls On
description:
Ryan Clark and the NFL Live crew discuss Deshaun Watson’s comments after his settlement was reached with the NFL, Pete Carroll’s comments on Geno’s performance last night, expectations for the Chargers this season and what to expect from the Patriots offense tonight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Deshaun Watson speaks after reaching a settlement with the NFL and Pete Carroll's comments on Geno Smith.
